Blue-50.$description: Lightest blue tint for backgrounds and highlights.

Blue-200.$description: Soft blue for secondary fills and accents.

Blue-600.$description: Deep blue for primary brand and text.

Blue-800.$description: Darkest blue for high-contrast text and emphasis.

Red-50.$description: Lightest red tint for error backgrounds.

Red-200.$description: Soft red for secondary error accents.

Red-600.$description: Deep red for critical error states.

Red-800.$description: Darkest red for high-contrast error emphasis.

Green-50.$description: Lightest green tint for success backgrounds.

Green-200.$description: Soft green for secondary success accents.

Green-600.$description: Deep green for confirmed success states.

Green-800.$description: Darkest green for high-contrast success emphasis.

Gold-50.$description: Lightest gold tint for warning backgrounds.

Gold-200.$description: Soft gold for secondary warning accents.

Gold-400.$description: Medium gold for warning indicators and luxury accents.

Gold-600.$description: Deep gold for prominent warning states.

Grey-200.$description: Soft grey for borders and dividers.

Grey-400.$description: Medium grey for placeholder and muted text.

Grey-900.$description: Near-black grey for maximum depth on light surfaces.

Violet-50.$description: Lightest violet tint for accent backgrounds.

Violet-600.$description: Deep violet for primary brand elements.

Violet-800.$description: Darkest violet for high-contrast brand emphasis.

White.$description: Pure white for light backgrounds and contrast text.

Black.$description: Pure black for dark backgrounds and high-contrast text.

Slate-50.$description: Lightest slate for subtle background fills.

Slate-200.$description: Soft slate for borders and card backgrounds.

Slate-400.$description: Medium slate for muted text and icons.

Slate-600.$description: Deep slate for secondary body text.

Slate-800.$description: Dark slate for headings and emphasis.

Slate-900.$description: Darkest slate for primary text on light surfaces.

050.$description: Small gaps (label to input, icon to text).

Text-size-100.$description: Smallest text for fine print and labels.

Weight-Medium.$description: Medium emphasis for buttons and labels.

Tracking-Tight.$description: Tight letter spacing for large headings (-2%).

Tracking-Wide.$description: Wide letter spacing for small text or uppercase (+2%).

Tracking-Wider.$description: Extra-wide tracking for labels and small caps (+5%).

Tracking-Widest.$description: Maximum tracking for dramatic display text (+10%).

Para-Airy.$description: Very airy paragraph spacing for editorial layouts (48px).

Indent-Medium.$description: Medium first-line indent for book-style typography (32px).

Indent-Large.$description: Large first-line indent for dramatic editorial style (48px).

Font-sans.$description: Clean, modern sans-serif for UI and body text.

Font-mono.$description: Monospaced font for code and data.

Font-geometric.$description: Rounded geometric sans-serif for friendly brands.

Font-humanist.$description: Traditional humanist serif for professional brands.

Font-display.$description: Elegant display serif for luxury headings.

Font-system.$description: Native OS typeface for maximum neutrality.

Radius-SM.$description: Small rounding for inputs and chips.

Radius-MD.$description: Standard rounding for buttons and cards.

Radius-Full.$description: Fully circular for avatars and badges.

Primary-Pressed.$description: Deeper shift for touch/click active states.

Primary-Container.$description: Tinted background for low-emphasis primary elements like tonal buttons and chips.

On-Primary-Container.$description: Text and icons on Primary-Container backgrounds.

Secondary-Container.$description: Tinted background for low-emphasis secondary elements.

On-Secondary-Container.$description: Text and icons on Secondary-Container backgrounds.

Error-Container.$description: Tinted background for error-related content areas.

On-Error-Container.$description: Text and icons on Error-Container backgrounds.

Success-Container.$description: Tinted background for success-related content areas.

On-Success-Container.$description: Text and icons on Success-Container backgrounds.

Warning-Container.$description: Tinted background for warning-related content areas.

On-Warning-Container.$description: Text and icons on Warning-Container backgrounds.

Font-Brand.$description: Brand typeface for headlines and marketing.

Font-Interface.$description: UI typeface for body text and controls.

Font-Data.$description: Tabular typeface for code and numeric data.

Text-size-small.$description: Small text for captions and labels.

Weight-button.$description: Action weight for buttons and CTAs.

Line-Height-UI-label.$description: Compact line height for single-line UI labels.

Tracking-heading.$description: Letter spacing for headings and large text.

Tracking-label.$description: Letter spacing for labels and UI elements.

Radius-Small.$description: Corner rounding for small elements like badges and chips.

Radius-Medium.$description: Corner rounding for medium elements like buttons and inputs.

Radius-Large.$description: Corner rounding for large elements like cards and modals.

Font-Family.$description: Font family for button label text.

Content.$description: Text and icon colour on filled button.
Text and icon colour on outline button.

Heading-Font-Family.$description: Font family for card title text.

Body-Font-Family.$description: Font family for card body text.
